about_the_game: Eternal Quest is a video game that mixes genres of strategy and role in a devastating adventure that will follow the steps of a group of marked heroes who seek to free humanity from the fragmented tower. Build your deck, choose a hero and open up your path through the portal to restore the citadelle, and become more powerful, fight against strange creatures, discover relics with enormous power and slay the fearful bosses that inhabit the tower's floors.
